lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild of Austria raced to her second straight slalom victory, beating the world champion Sarka Zahrobska of the Czech Republic by 0.68 seconds in Panorama, British Columbia.Schild had a two-run time of 1:39.95 seconds. Zahrobska finished in 1:40.63, and Ana Jelusic was third by one-hundredth of a second. Schild, who won the season-opening slalom Nov. 10 in Reiteralm, Austria, has won six of seven slaloms dating to last season.
